Package com.storage.engine

Class StorageDBBuilder

java.lang.Object
com.storage.engine.StorageDBBuilder
public class StorageDBBuilder extends Object
The builder class for creating a StorageDB instance with custom configuration.

    • build

      public StorageDB build() throws IOException
      Builds and returns the StorageDB instance with the configured parameters.
      Returns:
      The built StorageDB instance.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the creation of the StorageDB instance.
